document_data.name: Tyresia
document_data.mainbody: '''Tyresia''' was the half-brother (through their father) of [[Methrammar Aerasumé]]. Although they were close and spent much of their time crafting magic items together, Tyresia eventually returned to his family, leaving [[Swiftflight]] as a parting gift.{{Cite web/Realms Personalities/Methrammar Aerasumé}}
